info.brief_description: Select a race of your choice and take a domination or submission scenarios that you like
info.description:
DISCLAIMER: use of racial stereotypes of all creeds which don’t hold any factual truth but are mere sexual fantasies of domination over others or being dominated one self.


Pick any race of the major races you would like to be the superior. The list goes from:

- Hispanic

- Black

- White

- Asian


All these categories have following story types:

- Global Race Size Growth: The race you picked will all grow into giants to take their place as superiors in the world.

- Race Traitor: A other race girl discovers the superiority of the race you picked, abandoning her bloodline and submits herself. While in marriage or single.

- Hyper Breeder: A man from the race you picked will go on a full breeding rampage and douse countries of women with his impregnating seed.

- Hyper Broodmother: A woman births children like crazy and drowns her country with her offspring.


CHAPTERS WILL BE REMOVED IF:
- Completely demonizing a race. Humiliating, enslaving and dominating one is fine, but don’t say they deserved it or are that one is inheritable evil compared to the others.
- Chapter too short (roughly 200 words.) Making option menu sometimes acceptable.
- Has underage, corpse or animal sex in it.
- Poor gramma.
- Not following the raceplay theme.
